properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST ) VALUES( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, INTEREST, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET PHONE = ?, EMAIL = ?, ADDRESS = ?, INTEREST = ?, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ?, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
